channel.title: upfall studios on David Amador
channel.description: Recent content in upfall studios on David Amador

item.title: I'm a Xbox One developer now, QoD getting a port
item.description: So a lot has happened since my last post. Even before EGX I was already in talks with Microsoft for becoming a Xbox One developer and maybe get Quest of Dungeons to XO. I was extremely happy when they accepted both, so right now I’m working on porting the game to Xbox One. I don’t think this would have been possible without all the gamers that have played and are still playing the game, that’s what brought all the positive vibe surrounding the game, so a big thank you.
